    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40a67cc4-2c08-41c0-2152-a56bc8e8fab9#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Caravaggio: Szent Máté mártíromsága, 1599-1600 Róma, San Luigi dei Fracesi, Contarelli-kápolna. 323 x 343 cm. Olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Caravaggio: Martyrdom of Saint Matthew, 1599-1600 Rome, San Luigi dei Fracesi, Contarelli-chapel. 323 x 343 cm. Oil on canvas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Caravaggio: Martyrium von Heiligem Matthew,
1599-1600 Rom, San Luigi dei Fracesi, Contarelli-Kapelle. 323 x
343 Zentimeter. Öl auf Segeltuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caravaggio : Martyre de Saint Matthew, 
1599-1600 Rome, dei Fracesi, Contarelli-chapelle de San Luigi. 
323 x 343 centimètres. Huile sur la toile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caravaggio: Martyrdom de Saint Matthew, 
1599-1600 Roma, dei Fracesi do San Luigi, 
Contarelli-contarelli-chapel. 323 x 343 cm. Óleo na lona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caravaggio: Martyrdom di San Matthew, 
1599-1600 Roma, dei Fracesi, Contarelli-contarelli-chapel di San 
Luigi. 323 x 343 centimetri. Olio su tela di canapa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Caravaggio: Μαρτύριο Αγίου Matthew, 
1599-1600 Ρώμη, dei Fracesi, θονταρελλη-παρεκκλησι SAN 
Luigi. 323 X 343 εκατ.. Πετρέλαιο στον 
καμβά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caravaggio: Martirio de Santo Matthew, 
1599-1600 Roma, dei Fracesi, Contarelli-capilla del San Luigi. 
323 x 343 centímetros. Aceite en lona</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Máté a tömeg közepén a gyilkos csapásától lehanyatlik</string>
            <string language="en">Matthew tumbles down in the middle of a crowd after the stroke of a murder</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">17. század,   festészet,   Itália,   Caravaggio,  </string>
            <string language="en">17th century, painting, Italy, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Matthew stolpert unten mitten in einer Masse nach
dem Anschlag eines Mordes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matthew dégringole vers le bas au milieu 
d'une foule après la rappe d'un meurtre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matthew cai para baixo no meio de uma multidão 
após o curso de um assassinato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matthew cade giù nel mezzo di una folla dopo il 
colpo di un omicidio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Matthew πέφτει κάτω στη μέση ενός πλήθους μετά 
από το κτύπημα μιας δολοφονίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matthew cae abajo en el centro de una muchedumbre
después del movimiento de un asesinato</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">17. Jahrhundert, Anstrich, Italien, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">17ème siècle, peinture, Italie, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">17o século, pintura, Italy, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diciassettesimo secolo, pittura, Italia, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">17$ος αιώνας, ζωγραφική, Ιταλία, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">17mo siglo, pintura, Italia, Caravaggio</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
